node_1: eternal sunshine of the spotless mind (soundtrack)
edge: Jon Brion composed the soundtrack for Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind, which features songs from other artists.

node_1: eternal sunshine of the spotless mind (soundtrack)
edge: Beck's cover version of 'Everybody's Got to Learn Sometime' is featured in Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind's soundtrack.

node_1: the korgis' 'everybody's got to learn sometime'
edge: Jon Brion provided instrumentation for Beck's cover version of 'Everybody's Got to Learn Sometime' in Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind's soundtrack.
